titles.title: To provide for a certificate recognizing employees of defense companies for contributions to the national defense during the Cold War.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Armed Services.

bill.summary: 9/21/2004--Introduced. Directs the Secretary of Defense to prepare a certificate recognizing the contributions to the national defense during the Cold War by an eligible individual employed by a defense company and to provide the certificate to such individual. Requires an eligible individual to apply for such certificate.
